br.ufrgs.MASBench.BinaryMaxSum.Factor

Class SingleWeightFactor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrgs.MASBench.BinaryMaxSum.Factor.ProxyFactor<T>
      • br.ufrgs.MASBench.BinaryMaxSum.Factor.SingleWeightFactor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the factor's identity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Factor<T>

    public class SingleWeightFactor<T>
extends ProxyFactor<T>
    Factor that composes (sums) an independent cost/utility for each neighbor with some other inner (non-independent) factor.
    The resulting complexity is the same as that of the inner factor.
    Author:
    Toni Penya-Alba (tonipenya @ iiia.csic.es)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleWeightFactor(Factor<T> innerFactor)
      Build a new weighting factor with the specified inner factor.
